item.description:
It's Fall, Let's try a Corn Field Maze!
This looks like it'll be a blast!
I've never done one of these but always wanted to check one out. This looks like one of the largest and best cornfield mazes in Massachusetts.
Since I've never been here, not really sure where we can meet but I'll e-mail the group at LEAST a week before the event with that info.

Check out the websight:

DavisMegaMaze.com

Tickets are: $16.95 for ages 13-59 and $12.95 for kids 5-12

If it rains that day or the night before they might be closed so the rain date will be the following day. (Sunday the 19th) Same time..

After a day of fun we can go for some lunch. I don't know Sterling at all but I'll have a GPS that can list local places to eat or we can just go back towards Worcester for lunch (maybe Finder's Pub?)

I won't set a limit on the RSVP's So if you're unsure you can make it (maybe), RSVP the day before the event.
That's why the "maybe" isn't an option.

If you have any questions or ideas for future fall events e-mail me or you can call me at:
(508) 212-4111

Mark
item.name: Davis' MEGA Cornfield Maze
